Package interfaces

Interface InterbankInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
InterbankBoundary
public interface InterbankInterface
This interface provides functions that the interbank subsystem must be implemented for its communication with other subsystem Any interbank must implement this interface as a loose connection between the subsystems
Author:
chauntm

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    double getBalance​(CreditCard creditCard)
    Get current balance of a given credit card.
    PaymentTransaction payDeposit​(CreditCard creditCard, double amount, java.lang.String content)
    Perform paying deposit process, with a given credit card and and amount of money to deduct
    PaymentTransaction payRental​(CreditCard creditCard, double amount, java.lang.String content)
    Perform paying rental process, with a given credit card and and amount of money to deduct
    PaymentTransaction returnDeposit​(CreditCard creditCard, double amount, java.lang.String content)
    Perform returning deposit process, with a given credit card and and amount of money to return

  • Method Details

    • payDeposit

      PaymentTransaction payDeposit​(CreditCard creditCard, double amount, java.lang.String content)
      Perform paying deposit process, with a given credit card and and amount of money to deduct
      Parameters:
      creditCard - the card being deducted
      amount - the amount of money to be deducted
      content - information about the transfer
      Returns:
      A PaymentTransaction record about the transaction
      null if the transaction fails

    • returnDeposit

      PaymentTransaction returnDeposit​(CreditCard creditCard, double amount, java.lang.String content)
      Perform returning deposit process, with a given credit card and and amount of money to return
      Parameters:
      creditCard - the card getting the return
      amount - the amount of money to be returned
      content - information about the transfer
      Returns:
      A PaymentTransaction record about the transaction
      null if the transaction fails

    • payRental

      PaymentTransaction payRental​(CreditCard creditCard, double amount, java.lang.String content)
      Perform paying rental process, with a given credit card and and amount of money to deduct
      Parameters:
      creditCard - the card being deducted
      amount - the amount of money to be deducted
      content - information about the transfer
      Returns:
      A PaymentTransaction record about the transaction
      null if the transaction fails

    • getBalance

      double getBalance​(CreditCard creditCard)
      Get current balance of a given credit card.
      Parameters:
      creditCard - The card with the balance to be queried
      Returns:
      the current balance of the card
